product_name: One Ball Jay Four Wheel Drive Warm Weather Wax
long_description: The One Ball Jay Four Wheel Drive warm weather wax will have your board or skis zipping down the slopes. Hyndrocarbon formula features no additives. Warm formula is for 26degF to 32degF. Simply drip and smooth with iron, scrape when cold, brush and go.
short_description: The One Ball Jay Four Wheel Drive warm weather wax will have your board or skis zipping down the slopes.
